entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 28.
